      • has

        public boolean has(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                   Role role,
                   boolean notify,
                   java.lang.String permissionMessage)
        Checks whether the specified player has the role (or something leveled hierarchy higher). If they do not a missing permission message is automatically sent to that person.
        Parameters:
        player - the player
        role - the required role
        notify - whether or not to tell the player they don't have permission
        permissionMessage - message to send if they don't have it
        Returns:
        either yes or no
